org.dotplot.core.plugins
Interface IPluginContext<P extends IPlugin>

All Superinterfaces:
IContext, IFrameworkContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
DotplotContext, PluginContext
public interface IPluginContext<P extends IPlugin>
extends IFrameworkContext

Instances of this class are FrameworkContext for the plugin-framework.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt

getPluginDirectory

java.lang.String getPluginDirectory()
Returns the path of the pluing directory. Plugins are stored in this directory.

Returns:
- the path of the directory.

installPlugin

void installPlugin(P plugin)
                   throws DuplicateRegistrationException
Installs a Plugin into the PluginContext.

A Plugin in installed in adding its jobs and services to the registrys of the PluginContext and registering it in the PluginRegistry.

Parameters:
plugin - - the Plugin to be installed
Throws:
DuplicateRegistrationException - if a Plugin with the specified id is allready installed.
